title: Former governor begins tour to promote energy book
text:
Former Gov. Brian Schweitzer begins Montana tour promoting new energy book 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/9/15 3:54 pm EDT - Updated: 10/9/15 3:54 pm EDT 
HELENA, Montana — Former Gov. Brian Schweitzer is kicking off a Montana tour to promote his new book on the future of energy in the U.S. 
The Democrat plans to sign copies of "Power Up.energy" in Helena on Saturday, followed by stops in Great Falls, Billings and other Montana locations. 
Schweitzer's book talks about consumer power storage as the future of energy, along with the importance of developing renewable energy resources and researching technology to make fossil fuels such as coal more efficient. 
Schweitzer told reporters Friday energy has always been his passion and he spent the last year pouring his heart and soul into writing the book. 
An electronic version of the book has been available on Amazon since August and a print version published by the Philipsburg Mail is now on sale. Former Montana Gov.
